name: Suzu & Mari's Adventure 2 ~ lost colors and golden bells ~
name_original: Suzu & Mari's Adventure 2 ~ lost colors and golden bells ~
description:
------------ About the game ------------
Control Suzu, the cat-eared girl, and work with her partner, Mari, the ghost cat, to reach the goal!

Throw Mari to possess ghost in the stage.
You can freely control the possessed ghost as a player character.

The possessed ghost can be used as a scaffold, push switches, use its unique abilities, and more.
Use them to your advantage to solve the stage's tricks and open the way to the goal.

Try your best to clear all 60+ stages of the puzzle!


------------ Game Rules ------------
This game is an orthodox 2D action puzzle game that uses only the left/right move, jump, and possession buttons.

The player controls Suzu, the player character, and uses the possession and gimmicks to her advantage.
The goal of the game is to reach the goal point bell.


------------ Operation ------------
# Keyboard
Arrow keys : Select menu / Move
Space key : Jump
Z key : Decide / Activate possession / Release possession
X key : Cancel
Esc : Pause

# Gamepad
Cross key : Select menu / Move
0 button : Decide / Jump
1 button : Cancel / Activate possession / Release possession
7 button : Pause
* Gamepad key assignments can be changed from the options menu.
